title: House of the White Man (Haus des weißen Mannes) from the portfolio New European Graphics, 1st Portfolio: Masters of the State Bauhaus, Weimar, 1921 (Neue europäische Graphik, 1. Mappe: Meister des Staatlichen Bauhauses in Weimar, 1921)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 9 7/8 x 9 7/16" (25.1 x 24 cm); sheet: 13 3/4 x 11 1/8" (35 x 28.2 cm)
